cause.description:
Roswell High School's Habitat for Humanity Campus Chapter was chartered in 2004 at the completion of our first year of fundraising efforts. Since then, we have built two complete homes with money solely raised by our club. We have also contributed major finances to two other builds while still providing volunteers.
1. Eliminate Sub-standard / Poverty Housing
2. Increase the value of personal equity
cause.mission: raise funds to provide affordable quality housing.
cause.name: Roswell High School Habitat for Humanity
